name: BetterAutoFilterBot
description: A Filter Bot Which Doesnt Need Manuall Filter Adding

WEBHOOK.description: No need to change this field!

APP_ID.description: Your APP ID From my.telegram.org or @JNS_tg_orgbot

API_HASH.description: Your API Hash From my.telegram.org or @JNS_tg_orgbot

AUTH_USERS.description: ID of users that can use the bot commands

SAVE_USER.description: Do you need to save user details? Usefull for getting userinfo and total user counts. May reduce filter capacity. Give yes or no

DATABASE_NAME.description: Your database name from mongoDB. ( Default will 'Cluster0' )

FORCESUB_CHANNEL.description: For Force Subscribe.(bot should be admin in this fsub channel) Paste your forcesubscribe channel USERNAME (without @).. #if you don't want this , kept empty

DB_URI.description: Your Mongo DB URL Obtained From mongodb.com

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: To check dyno status. Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API

USER_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram User Session String. Generated From @STRING_SESSION_jns_BOT
